name: flowcrypt-browser
description: Simple end-to-end encryption to secure email and attachments on Google.

scripts.pretest: npm run build --silent && cd conf && node ../build/tooling/tsc-compiler --project tsconfig.test.json && node ../build/tooling/resolve-modules --project tsconfig.test.json
scripts.pretest-incremental: npm run build-incremental --silent && cd conf && node ../build/tooling/tsc-compiler --project tsconfig.test.json && node ../build/tooling/resolve-modules --project tsconfig.test.json
scripts.test: npm run test_buf && npm run test_eslint && npm run test_patterns && npm run test_async_stack && npm run test_ci_chrome_consumer -- -- --pool-size=1
scripts.test_local_chrome_consumer_mock: npm run pretest && npm run test_ci_chrome_consumer -- -- --pool-size=1 --debug
scripts.test_local_chrome_enterprise_mock: npm run pretest && npm run test_ci_chrome_enterprise -- -- --pool-size=1 --debug
scripts.test_local_chrome_consumer_live_gmail: npm run pretest && npm run test_ci_chrome_consumer_live_gmail -- -- --pool-size=1 --debug
scripts.test_local_chrome_consumer_mock_flaky: npm run pretest && npm run test_ci_chrome_consumer_flaky -- -- --pool-size=1 --retry=false --debug
scripts.test_local_unit_consumer: npm run pretest && npx ava --timeout=20m --verbose --tap --concurrency=10 build/test/test/source/test.js -- UNIT-TESTS --retry=false --debug CONSUMER-MOCK | npx tap-xunit > report.xml
scripts.test_local_unit_enterprise: npm run pretest && npx ava --timeout=20m --verbose --tap --concurrency=10 build/test/test/source/test.js -- UNIT-TESTS --retry=false --pool-size=1 --debug ENTERPRISE-MOCK | npx tap-xunit > report.xml
scripts.test_stylelint: stylelint extension/css/cryptup.css extension/css/settings.css extension/css/webmail.css && stylelint extension/**/*.htm --custom-syntax postcss-html
scripts.test_ci_chrome_consumer_live_gmail: npx ava --timeout=30m --verbose --tap --concurrency=1 build/test/test/source/test.js -- CONSUMER-LIVE-GMAIL STANDARD-GROUP | npx tap-xunit > report.xml
scripts.test_ci_chrome_consumer: npx ava --timeout=30m --verbose --tap --concurrency=10 build/test/test/source/test.js -- CONSUMER-MOCK STANDARD-GROUP | npx tap-xunit > report.xml
scripts.test_ci_chrome_enterprise: npx ava --timeout=30m --verbose --tap --concurrency=10 build/test/test/source/test.js -- ENTERPRISE-MOCK STANDARD-GROUP | npx tap-xunit > report.xml
scripts.test_ci_chrome_consumer_flaky: npx ava --timeout=30m --verbose --tap --concurrency=10 build/test/test/source/test.js -- CONSUMER-MOCK FLAKY-GROUP | npx tap-xunit > report.xml
scripts.run_firefox: npm run build-incremental && npx web-ext run --source-dir ./build/firefox-consumer/ --firefox-profile ~/.mozilla/firefox/flowcrypt-dev --keep-profile-changes
scripts.run_firefox_windows: npm run build-incremental && npx web-ext run --source-dir ./build/firefox-consumer/ --firefox-profile %userprofile%/AppData/Local/Mozilla/Firefox/Profiles/flowcrypt-dev --keep-profile-changes
scripts.find_unused: ts-prune -p tsconfig.json | grep -v extension/types | grep -v extension/js/common/core

author: FlowCrypt a.s.
